com.yubico.base
Class Pof

java.lang.Object
  com.yubico.base.Pof

public class Pof
extends java.lang.Object

Utility methods of use when decryption and parsing of YubiKey One Time Passwords (OTPs).

Author:
Simon

Method Summary
static byte[] decrypt(byte[] key, byte[] decoded)
           Does AES encryption of a YubiKey OTP byte sequence.
static Token parse(java.lang.String block, byte[] key)
           Decrypt and parse YubiKey OTP.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

parse

public static Token parse(java.lang.String block,
                          byte[] key)
                   throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException

Decrypt and parse YubiKey OTP.

Parameters:
block - Modhex encoded representation of the YubiKey OTP.
key - 128 bit AES key used to encrypt block, now will be used to ecrypt.
Throws:
java.security.GeneralSecurityException - If decryption fails.

decrypt

public static byte[] decrypt(byte[] key,
                             byte[] decoded)
                      throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException

Does AES encryption of a YubiKey OTP byte sequence.

Parameters:
key - AES key.
decoded - YubiKey OTP byte sequence, Modhex.decode(String) is the typical producer of this.
Returns:
Decrypted.
Throws:
java.security.GeneralSecurityException - If decryption fails.
